about_the_game:
Ultimate Dinos World is a clean and stylish interactive 3D live wallpaper that display cool low-poly dinos on the desktop with animated backgrounds. You can control and interact with dinos with your mouse.

Features

  • Support Workshop,One-Click download online themes
  • Support Custom Theme,Provide multiple dinos and backgrounds for you to choose, many editing options.
  • Support interact with mouse.
  • Support Pause Mode - You can pause wallpaper when you need 100% power for your games.
  • Optimization - reduced equipment requirements. Low CPU usage.
  • Multi, wide, 4K screens support - You can choose one of the screens or extend the wallpaper to all screens. Works smooth at 4K.
  • Support Taskbar Aero Blur or fully transparent (for Win10) .
  • Support Windows 7/8/8.1/10

FAQ

Q: Why can't I see the desktop icon?
A: 1. Make sure your Windows had enabled Aero
2. Adjust Windows System "System Properties>>Performance Options>>Visual Effects" to "Adjust for best appearance"
3. Please add UltimateDinosWorld.exe and CoreHost.exe in App folder Path to your AntiVirus Software's Trust-White-List and Restart computer


Q: How to remove Steam Hook?
A: Right click the UltimateDinosWorld tray icon and select the menu item "Preferences..." ,Uncheck the "Enable Steam Support", Restart UltimateDinosWorld .


Q: Can I use UltimateDinosWorld with WallpaperEngine at the same time?
A: NO. Live wallpaper software is exclusive. So if they are used at the same time, they will cover each other.


Q: How to Exit/Shutdown UltimateDinosWorld ?
A:1. You can exit UltimateDinosWorld from tray icon menu "Exit" (Screen Bottom-Right corner,near by your WIFI icon).
2. if can not found the tray icon, please open the system TaskMgr to kill the processes "UltimateDinosWorld .exe"
detailed_description:
UltimateDesktop Collection




About the Software

Ultimate Dinos World is a clean and stylish interactive 3D live wallpaper that display cool low-poly dinos on the desktop with animated backgrounds. You can control and interact with dinos with your mouse.

Features

  • Support Workshop,One-Click download online themes
  • Support Custom Theme,Provide multiple dinos and backgrounds for you to choose, many editing options.
  • Support interact with mouse.
  • Support Pause Mode - You can pause wallpaper when you need 100% power for your games.
  • Optimization - reduced equipment requirements. Low CPU usage.
  • Multi, wide, 4K screens support - You can choose one of the screens or extend the wallpaper to all screens. Works smooth at 4K.
  • Support Taskbar Aero Blur or fully transparent (for Win10) .
  • Support Windows 7/8/8.1/10

FAQ

Q: Why can't I see the desktop icon?
A: 1. Make sure your Windows had enabled Aero
2. Adjust Windows System "System Properties>>Performance Options>>Visual Effects" to "Adjust for best appearance"
3. Please add UltimateDinosWorld.exe and CoreHost.exe in App folder Path to your AntiVirus Software's Trust-White-List and Restart computer


Q: How to remove Steam Hook?
A: Right click the UltimateDinosWorld tray icon and select the menu item "Preferences..." ,Uncheck the "Enable Steam Support", Restart UltimateDinosWorld .


Q: Can I use UltimateDinosWorld with WallpaperEngine at the same time?
A: NO. Live wallpaper software is exclusive. So if they are used at the same time, they will cover each other.


Q: How to Exit/Shutdown UltimateDinosWorld ?
A:1. You can exit UltimateDinosWorld from tray icon menu "Exit" (Screen Bottom-Right corner,near by your WIFI icon).
2. if can not found the tray icon, please open the system TaskMgr to kill the processes "UltimateDinosWorld .exe"
name: Ultimate Dinos World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 / 8.1 / 8 / 7(with Aero)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: Ultimate Dinos World is a clean and stylish interactive 3D live wallpaper that display cool low-poly dinos on the desktop with animated backgrounds. You can control and interact with dinos with your mouse.
